Uses of Class
platformer.ExtendedShapes.MBControls

  • Packages that use QBMControls 
    Package Description
    logic  
    platformer  

    • Uses of QBMControls in logic

      Methods in logic with parameters of type QBMControls 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void QCamera.draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g, QBMControls box)
      Draws given box with its coordinates shifted, so that it is in accordance with the camera.
      static void QEngine.jump(QBMControls character)
      Makes the given character jump.
      static void QEngine.keyPressed(int key, QBMControls character)
      Actions for key presses.
      static void QEngine.keyReleased(int key, QBMControls character)
      Actions for key releases.
      static void QEngine.moveLeft(QBMControls character)
      Makes character move left, Character will never exceed it's max given velocity, and will accelerate by factor of accelerate while on ground and factor of air friction while in air.
      static void QEngine.moveRight(QBMControls character)
      Makes character move right, Character will never exceed it's max given velocity, and will accelerate by factor of accelerate while on ground and factor of air friction while in air.
      static void QEngine.postUpdate(QBMControls character)
      Actions to take after collisions were checked for, This simply adds Vectors to the position.
      static void QEngine.preUpdate(QBMControls character)
      Actions to take before checking for collisions, Will check movement and gravity.
      static void QEngine.rest(QBMControls character)
      If character is not moving left or right then we decelerate him.

      Subclasses of QBMControls in platformer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicCharacter
      This is a very basic character.
